overview: Vivek did his undergrad in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Delhi. After graduation, Vivek worked with Trilogy and then moved on to help bootstrap the A9 (subsidiary of Amazon.com) India team. Vivek led multiple projects at A9/Amazon with focus on behavioral targeting and text mining technologies in US/UK English, German, French and Japanese. The projects were used to extend and enhance the offering of Amazon Associates (affiliates). Bored with gray skies of Seattle, Vivek moved to LA and started HintCafe, an online dating service for professionals. Vivek joined EQAL in Jan 2010 and leads the technology team.
